_header: Saint Quiriac that bishop was preached Gods law
Note: Same as lines 357-390 of Sancta Crux in Oxford, Bodleian Library Laud misc. 108 (SC 1486) — see 5337.
Subjects: saints’ lives; Quiriac, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Quiriac in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn quiriac þat biscop was prechede godes laweIulian þe
                    luþer emperour broȝte him of lif dawe…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…& is soule to heuene wende after þis tormentyngeGod
                    uor þe loue of seynt quiriac to þulke Ioie ous bringe
BodAsh43.Editions:
Morris,  Richard,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Holy Rood, Symbols of the Passion, and
                Cross-Poems.
EETS
         o.s. 46 (1871); repr. 1973: 58-61.

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint quiriac þat bysschop was prechid goddus laweIulian
                    þe liþir emperour brouȝt him seþþe of
                    dawe…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& his woule [sic] wente to heuene after his
                    tormentingnow good for þe loue of hym to þilke ioy vs
                    bring

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Quiriac þe Bisschop prechede Godus laweIulian þe
                    luþur Emperour brouht him seþþe of dawe…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…His soule wente to þe Ioye of heuene aftur his
                    tormentyngeCrist for þe loue of seint Quiriac to þulke Ioye vs
                    bringe A.M.E.N.

Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.

         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Quiriak þat bishop was prechede godes laweIulian þe
                    luþer emperour brought sithe of dawe…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…And his soule to heuene went after his turmentingeGod for
                    þe loue of seint quiriak to þilke Ioye vs bringe
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEint quiriak þer aftir bischop was & prechid goddis
                    laweJulian þe wickid emperour brouȝte him siþe of
                    dawe…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…And his soule to heuyn wente after þis turmentyngeGod
                    for þe loue of seint quiriak to ioye þou vs bringe

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Seyn quiriak þat bissop was prechede godes laweIulian þe
                    luþer emperor broȝte him suþþe of dawe…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…And is soule to heuene wende after þis tormentyngeGod
                    for loue of sein quiriak to þulke ioie us bringe

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Quyriak þa Bisschop was prechede godes laweIulian
                    þe luþer Emperour þer ffore suþþe him brouȝte of
                    dawe…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…And his soule to heuene wente after his turmetyngeTo
                    þulke ioye þat he is ynne god vs alle brynge

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint quirac þat bischop was prechyd godys laweIulianj þe
                    luþer emperour broȝt hym suþþe of dawe…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…& his saule to heuene wende after his turmentyngegod for
                    þe loue of hym to þulke Ioie ous bringe

BLAdd10301.First Lines:

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEin quiriak þat bissop was orechede godes laweIulian þe luþer emperor broȝte him suþþe of dawe…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …And is soule to heuene wende afte þis tormentyngeGod for loue of sein quiriak to þulke ioie us bringe

BLHar2250.First Lines:
Saynt quyriak þe bisshop preached goddis lawe& Iulian
                    þe luthir emperour him broȝt sithen of dawe…
BLHar2250.Last Lines:
…Fader & sone & holy gost he ȝeue vs gode
                    endyngeSaynt elene & saynte quyriak to heuen riche vs
                    brynge

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEint quiriac þat bischop was prechede godes laweIulian þe liþer Emperour brouȝte him siþþe of dawe…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …& his soule to heuene wende after þis turmentingeGod for þe loue of Seint quiriac to þulke ioye ous bringe

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Quiriac þe bisshop preched goddes laweAnd Iulyan þe
                    liþer emperour him broȝt siþen of dawe…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…ffader & sone & holy gost he ȝeue vs gode
                    endingeSaynt Quiriac & saynt Elyn to heuen riche vs bringe
                    Amen
